title: Idealyst Documentation
description: Idealyst is a modern, cross-platform framework for building React and React Native applications. It provides a powerful component library, type-safe APIs, and unified theming system that works seamlessly across web and mobile.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Components
crossPlatform.description: Build once, run everywhere. Components work identically on web and native with platform-specific optimizations.

theme.title: Powerful Theme System
theme.description: Define themes using a fluent builder API with full TypeScript inference. Customize colors, typography, and component sizes.

styleExtensions.title: Style Extensions
styleExtensions.description: Extend or override component styles at build time without modifying source code.

typeSafe.title: Type-Safe APIs
typeSafe.description: End-to-end type safety with tRPC and GraphQL support, including automatic TypeScript inference.

navigation.title: Unified Navigation
navigation.description: Single navigation API for both web and mobile with type-safe routes and deep linking.
